title: Network Engineer Intern
description: Assist with the installation of internet networks to ensure optimal performance
Troubleshoot and resolve network issues efficiently
Maintain and repair network devices to ensure continuous operation
Identify and analyze network problems to provide effective solutions
Provide technical support and assistance to customers or users

title: Frontend Developer Intern
description: Developed and maintained responsive user interfaces using Angular framework.
Implemented dynamic and reusable UI components with Bootstrap for consistency and responsiveness.
Collaborated with backend developers to integrate RESTful APIs and ensure seamless data rendering.
Utilized version control tools like Git/Github for efficient code management.
